Act_frame: rejecting a temporary regular residence permit
Object: application to provide a temporary regular residence permit

Preconditions.condition: alien has a travel ban or has been signaled for the purpose of refusing entry

Preconditions.OR NOT: alien has a provisional temporary residence permit
alien has a valid border-crossing document
interested party has sufficient, independent, long-term means of support

Preconditions.OR: alien constitutes a threat to public order or national security

Preconditions.OR NOT: alien is willing to cooperate in a medical examination of a disease designated by the Public Health Act or to undergo medical treatment for such a disease

Preconditions.OR: alien has performed any work in violation of the Aliens Labor Act

Preconditions.OR NOT: alien meets the restriction related to the purpose of residence
alien has sufficient knowledge of the Dutch language and Dutch society

Preconditions.OR: alien has provided incorrect data or has withheld data

Preconditions.OR NOT: alien has only resided in the Netherlands on the basis of Article 8 Aliens Act
sponsor has submitted a statement for the purpose of the intended residence of the alien

Preconditions.AND NOT: adverse consequences of a decision may not be disproportionate to the purposes to be served by the decision

Creating_postcondition: decision to reject application to provide a temporary regular residence permit
Terminating_postcondition: application to provide a temporary regular residence permit
References_to_sources: Art. 14 (1) Aliens Act, main clause and under (a)
